'''"...Anyone can be a gourmet."''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to fail the cooking mini-game and produce a Suspicious-quality dish 10 times.

==Notes==
{{Transclude|"If you put your heart into it..."|Notes}}

==Trivia==
*When read together with the Chinese name of [["If you put your heart into it..."]], the Chinese name of this achievement forms a quote from the 1996 Hong Kong film {{w|The God of Cookery}} ({{Lang|mini=1|zh=食神|zh_rm=Shí Shén|zh_lit=Food God}}).
